marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= a council or a group of older men who act with authority on behalf of or over their people; some represent an entire nation, others manage the affairs at the town level; some provide their leader with counsel; involved in both judicial and military decisions, and participating in cultic ceremonies; ≈ expected to be wise and considered worthy of deference and respect
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

= male person speaking on behalf of a deity

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape
= action by which humans or deities inflict a penalty on others as retribution for what they have done
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to engage in any way with (other) humans or deities, or with other objects and events, often caused by pride and contempt

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: to open (one's) eyes; hence: = action by which deities make an active effort to see something

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

Node.definition: = causative action by which humans make an effort to arouse an emotion of shame in (other) humans or deities; ◄ by their words or actions
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= marker expressing a speaker's confirmation of the truth of a statement; in some cases the truth of this statement is conceded
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to destroy|to lay waste|to cause destruction
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans and deities cause total destruction to lands, constructions, or towns, including the people living there, either directly or through the hands of others, to the extent that sedentary life is no more possible there
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= set of particles marking an object or event as opposed to other objects and events
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= a single piece of wood taken from a tree, cut and finished, and used for building and construction
= hard, heavy, and strong substance, ◄ very commonly found in nature, ► which can be hewn into different shapes by a craftsman

= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from existence; ◄ by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, destruction, or direct divine intervention; ► often as punishment
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state of being integrated but physically detached from other, similar objects or events
= causative action by which humans or deities send one or more people though the people sent are not mentioned explicitly to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
= man; ◄ son of Amoz (אָמֹוץ) ► prophet (נָבִיא)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of prophet (נָבִיא) Isaiah (יְשַׁעְיָהוּ)
= man, also known as Jehizkiah (יְחִזְקִיָּה) ◄ son of Ahaz (אָחָז) ► father of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= man; ► king of Assyria (אַשּׁוּר) (704 681)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which someone considers someone or something else unworthy of attention or respect, and shows that by his/her actions
only used in poetry; = action by which humans or deities express their disdain of others with words, sounds and/or gestures
= young unmarried woman, who has never been married before, and has never had sex with a man
singular only: = the population of a certain location, town, or ethnic group, ◄ referred to as the daughter of that location, town, or ethnic group
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
singular only: = the population of a certain location, town, or ethnic group, ◄ referred to as the daughter of that location, town, or ethnic group
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to reproach|to taunt|to insult|to defy|to blaspheme
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans make an effort to arouse an emotion of shame in (other) humans or deities; ◄ by their words or actions
= action by which a human being utters words that are intended to provoke shame in someone else

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
literally: to lift up (one's) voice; hence: = action by which humans speak more loudly than usual
literally: to lift up (one's) face or head); hence: = action by which humans look up without shame

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
literally: by the hand (of someone); hence: = process by which a certain event is carried out by an intermediary (person) or instrument (object)

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

Node.gloss: to reproach|to taunt|to insult|to defy|to blaspheme
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans make an effort to arouse an emotion of shame in (other) humans or deities; ◄ by their words or actions
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= a group of chariots (מֶרְכָּבָה) usually owned by one single person
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= the part of an object or area that is the furthest away from the perspective of the speaker or narrator
= range of mountains; ◄ north of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ► known for the cedar (אֶרֶז) and other trees growing there
= causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object
= vertical height of an object

= evergreen tree growing up to 40 m tall, with a trunk up to 2.5 m in diameter; as it grows older its branches spread out more and more horizontally; grows in elevated places; ◄ Cedrus libani; ► highly appreciated building material; also used in cleaning ritual; ≈ associated with beauty, quality, pride, and strength
= state in which persons or objects have been selected for their superior competencies or quality

exact meaning unsure: = one of the evergreen trees commonly found in the Lebanon, with round leaves rather than flat; its fruit is a a mostly inedible seed bearing, fleshy cone; ≈ regarded as one of the glorious trees of the Lebanon
= state of having reached the terminal point of an event
= a large group of trees or shrubs which grow close together and where several wild animals are known to live; ≈ considered to be a dangerous place for humans and domestic animals
literally: a forest of farmland; hence: = a forest on fertile land result in very dense growth; ≈ probably regarded as a remote and inaccessible place
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= causative action by which humans dig a well

Node.gloss: to make dry|to cause to dry up
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause a state of dryness; ► in the case of land, if this condition persists, sedentary life will become impossible
= slightly curved area of the human body or another object
= the lower part of the leg beyond the ankle, on which humans or animals stand and with which they walk
= a body of water flowing to and from the Nile river, whether in the form of a manmade canal or a subsidiary river branch, especially those of the Nile delta region
= another name for Egypt (מִצְרַיִם)
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: to make (plans); hence: = causative action by which humans or deities conceive events in their minds, ◄ described as an craftsperson producing an artifact
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= causative action by which deities conceive events in their minds, ◄ described as an artisan shaping clay into an artifact
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place
= causative action by which humans bring destruction to buildings and infrastructure
= a pile of stones, ► sometimes used as a memorial for an important event
= state/process by which objects are totally damaged by the hands of humans and so be unfit for human use

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= state in which an area has been made inaccessible and strong, beyond the reach of others, such as enemies, ◄ usually by surrounding it by a high wall
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
literally: short (of hand); hence: = state in which humans lack the power to perform a certain event
= state in which humans have lost most of their political strength ◄ as a result of defeat and death; ≈ associated with loss of status and with ridicule

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= any of various plants, herbs, grasses, seed bearing vegetation that can be consumed by human and/or animal

= a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.
= green leaves ◄ of a plant or tree; ► eaten by both animals and humans; ≈ associated with weakness and mortality
= a general term for plants, ► used as food by humans and animals; ≈ associated with frailty, but also with prosperity
= type of grass; ◄ plants; ► serves as food for animals; ≈ regarded as weak, vulnerable, and short lived
= the structure forming the upper covering of a building, usually built as a terrace, to which one goes up by stairs

= a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, ► sometimes used for farming or pasturing animals|= state in which plants have lost their moisture and have withered as a result of extreme heat
read קום (קום) to rise, grow or קָדִים (קָדִים) east wind
= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= action by which humans act in a way that is inspired by violent anger, ≈ which is considered foolish behavior
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes
= action by which humans act in a way that is inspired by violent anger, ≈ which is considered foolish behavior
= state in which humans live a peaceful life and have nothing to fear, which can easily lead to carelessness and arrogance
literally: to come up: hence: = process by which a certain sound or information reaches the ears of someone located in a high place
= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place

= small, curved piece of metal or bone or even a strong thorn, with a sharp point on one end, usually with a barb just behind the point, and a loop or bend on the other end to which a line can be attached; ► used to catch and control animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= part of the body projecting above the mouth on the face of a person or animal, containing the two nostrils

= short bar, ◄ usually made of metal, ► placed in the mouth of a horse; its ends, which project from the mouth of the animal, are attached to ropes or leather straps that fit over the head as the bridle (רֶסֶן) used to steer the horse; ≈ associated with control and, indirectly, with lack of wisdom
= causative action by which deities cause humans to face a direction different from the one they were facing before

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= object or event that reminds of something that has happened or as a confirmation of something that is yet to happen
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= crops that come up spontaneously during a year that nothing has been sown
= state in which a countable entity is the second in a range
= state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

= action by which humans scatter seeds or plant young plants in a field so that they may grow into a new crop; ≈ associated with the concept of investing in order to get a return; also associated with reproduction and perpetuation

= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)|= action of placing a seed or small plant in the ground so that it will grow and produce ≈ used symbolically to describe God's act of giving the people of Israel their own land, as promised to their ancestors
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= produce from crop bearing trees and plants
= process by which an action is repeated or continued
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= a part of a plant normally below ground, which acts as a support and collects water and nourishment, ≈ associated with well being, offspring, and the inclination of the mind

Node.gloss: to bear|to yield|to produce|to bring forth
Node.definition: literally: to make; hence: = natural process by which land, plants, or animals develop vegetation, branches, fruits, produce milk, etc.
= produce from crop bearing trees and plants
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place

= process by which humans or deities experience a sentiment of anger for the sake of someone else, ◄ because that other person does not receive the attention, commitment, or treatment that they are entitled to
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= causative action by which humans launch arrows (חֵץ) with the help of a bow (קֶשֶׁת)

= pointed missile, shot from a bow; slender and straight in shape and moving swiftly; ◄ made out of wood and/or iron; ► mainly used for hunting, in warfare, and occasionally for divination; ≈ symbol of aggression, affliction, and punishment

Node.gloss: to bring|to put in front of
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans place an object in front of another object

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God
= causative action by which humans pour out a liquid or dry substance
= earthen mound, cast up against the wall of a city ► in order to enable to enemy to scale the wall

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which a deity keeps people or town safe from harm or injury, as with a shield

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= a human or supernatural being who carries a message on behalf of someone else
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= state in which a countable entity is eighty in number
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil
= body of an animal or human that has died or been killed; ► source of pollution and impurity
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
literally to pluck up (the tent pegs); hence: = action by which a relatively large company of humans, together with their possessions, departs from a place where they had set up a temporary residence
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= man; ► king of Assyria (אַשּׁוּר) (704 681)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= town; ◄ located in northern Mesopotamia near Mosul on the east bank of the Tigris (חִדֶּקֶל) ► built by Nimrod (נִמְרֹד) after the flood (מַבּוּל) ancient capital of Assyria (אַשּׁוּר) preached against by the prophet Jonah (יֹונָה)
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity ◄ of Assyrians, ► in whose temple Sennacherib (סַנְחֵרִיב) assassinated by his sons Adrammelech (אַדְרַמֶּלֶךְ) and Sharezer (שַׂרְאֶצֶר)
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= man; ◄ son of Sennacherib (סַנְחֵרִיב) king of Assyria (אַשּׁוּר) ► who, together with his brother Sharezer (שַׂרְאֶצֶר) killed his father
= man; ◄ son of Sennacherib (סַנְחֵרִיב) king of Assyria (אַשּׁוּר) ► who, together with his brother Adrammelech (אַדְרַמֶּלֶךְ) killed his father
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a mountainous area and nation, also known as Urartu; ◄ located in E Asia Minor ; ► called in a prophecy to punish Babylon (בָּבֶל)

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= man; ◄ son of Sennacherib (סַנְחֵרִיב) ► king of Assyria (אַשּׁוּר)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
